renewed.translation[0].definitions[0].de: starting again, especially with increased interest or strength
renewed.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The festival went ahead, despite renewed protests.
renewed.translation[0].definitions[1].de: feeling healthy and relaxed again, after feeling ill or tired
renewed.translation[1].definitions[0].de: happening or increasing again after a period of time
renewed.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The dollar is riding higher on renewed optimism about the U.S. economy.
fears of a renewed slump in consumer spending
